pullrequest.title: A road is not a Model, but is a child of the world. This will cause a crash when accessing model by index.

content.html:
This loop seems to have slightly incorrect logic to me. If _index = 0, then it will return the first child, without actually checking to see if it HasType(Base::MODEL). I would try:

for (unsigned int i=0, count=0;
     i < this->rootElement->GetChildCount(); i++)
{
  if (this->rootElement->GetChild(i)->HasType(Base::MODEL)
  {
    if (count == _index)
    {
      model = boost::shared_static_cast<Model>(
          this->rootElement->GetChild(count));
      break;
    }
    count++;
  }
}
